other_tests.findings: Improved alertness and constipation; suppressed TSH levels; raised BMR; normalized elevated muscle CK levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Cardiac parameters (heart rate, contractility) remained relatively refractory despite treatment.

other_tests.findings: Bilateral theta waves during hyperventilation, supporting a diagnosis of epilepsy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Seizures recurred at age 20 years after sodium valproate treatment was discontinued; reduced seizure frequency upon restarting sodium valproate.

other_tests.findings: Baseline parameters in the hypothyroid range; after thyroxine treatment, most parameters were within hypothyroid or control ranges.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Some indices (heart rate, systolic and diastolic parameters) did not reach the thyrotoxic range, indicating blunted cardiac responsiveness to TH.

other_tests.findings: Normal baseline levels; markers rose progressively after thyroxine treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Some markers became high-normal while others became elevated indicating changes in bone metabolism.

other_tests.findings: Heterozygosity for a nucleotide deletion in THRA, shifting the reading frame and introducing a premature stop codon.

other_tests.procedure_name: Serum Copper and Selenium Levels Analysis
other_tests.findings: Copper levels rose with treatment; selenium levels remained unchanged.
